subject_terms_3: Decorative arts  Industrial and Product Design?
physical_appearance: This is a lacquered dish with gold decoration. Its broad flat rim is decorated with peonies and foliage. Featured in the centre of the dish is the de Muinck coat of arms. Some browning can be found across the dish.
sgcool_label_text:
This dish bears the coat of arms of the de Muinck family from the city of Middelburg, Netherlands. Japanese lacquered objects were very popular in Europe between the 16th and 18th centuries. Many westerners commissioned pieces from Japan. 

This armorial dish was probably privately commissioned by a member of the de Muinck family, and the form is likely modelled after a Dutch pewter dish.
title_text: Dish with the Arms of the de Muinck family
subject_terms_1: maki-e exports commissions (orders for works)  flower (motif)  foliage (motif)
subject_terms_2: Relief (Art)  Art commissions  Peonies in art Foliage plants  Middelburg (Netherlands)
